channel.title: Viva la vida - NeXus [Remix, WIP, Project, help]
channel.description:
https://app.auxy.co/projects/CZ6GS3Xt-eVwg8tPPrYzlQ==
i'm working on a remix of viva la vida but it shifts genres constantly. so far we got
classic ballad trap future bass
the genres i'm considering are complextro lofi
do you guys have any ideas for other genres?
